alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 10:15PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of East Arkansas, Southeast Missouri and West Tennessee. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to noon CST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from noon Sunday to 6 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Prolonged exposure to these conditions could result in frostbite or hypothermia.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
